/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of the sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees on both sides. The trees, standing tall and proud, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Street lamps, silent sentinels, line the street, ready to bathe it in a warm light as day turns into night. Cars, parked neatly along the side of the road, add a sense of life and movement to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings in the background. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, drawing the viewer's eye along the length of the street and inviting them to imagine what lies beyond.
